title: The sonne of the rogue, or, The politick theefe with the antiquitie of theeves : a worke no lesse curious then delectable / first written in Spanish by Don Garcia ; afterwards translated into Dutch, and then into French by S.D. ; now Englished by W.M.
author: García, Carlos, doctor.
publisher: Printed by I.D. for Michael Sparkes and are to [be] sold in Green-Arbor,
notes: Translation of: Desordenada codicia de los bienes agenos.
Imperfect: print show-through and tightly bound with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
